itemTooltip.nutriknight.bobatea: This is a Boba tea drink available in the Drinkworld of the Nutriknight game
itemTooltip.nutriknight.sugarslayer: This is a item used the kill the Boba Tea Abomination
itemTooltip.nutriknight.chembomb: This is a chemical bomb available in the Chemicalworld of the Nutriknight game
itemTooltip.nutriknight.frostsword: This is a Sword found in the Frozen World.
itemTooltip.nutriknight.icecreamfood: This is a treat that gives you instant damage and weakness as it lacks nutrition.
itemTooltip.nutriknight.broccoli: This instantly heals you and gives you a glowing effect because it has lots of nutrients in it.
itemTooltip.nutriknight.banana: This gives you a higher jump as bananas have nutrients in them which give you energy.
